sense.gloss: heated argument, heated discussion, heated debate

sdata.j: ↑兄弟↑↓きょうだい↓↑達↑↓たち↓は↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑結婚↑↓けっこん↓について|↑激論|↑↓げきろん↓を↑交↑↓か↓わしました。
sdata.e: The brothers had a hot dispute on her marriage.

sdata.e: The compromise which permits a smoker to smoke in the smoking corner was born after heated discussion.

sdata.e: I tried very hard to put an end to their heated argument.

sdata.e: He tried in vain to put an end to their heated discussion.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らは|↑激論|↑↓げきろん↓を↑交↑↓か↓わしていた。
sdata.e: They were engaged in a heated argument.
